text: Q31.| Assume that X and Y are subsets of the attributes of a relation R. Suppose thatX is a strict superset of Y (this means that all the attributes in Y appear in X,and X contains attributes that do not appear in Y).Consider the following two statements S1: If Y is a key, then'is X a key S2:if X is a key, is Y a key as well Which of the following two statements is /are true? (a) Only S1 (b)Only S2 (c) Both S1and S2 (d) neither S1 nor S2
